channel.title: CPP on LinuxBytes
channel.description: Recent content in CPP on LinuxBytes

item.title: Cpp System Monitor
item.description: CppND-System-Monitor Starter code for System Monitor Project in the C++ OOP course. In which I used for Udacity course on OOP. Github link CppND-System-Monitor

item.title: Route Planning Project
item.description: Route Planning Project In this project, I had use OpenStreetMap data and the IO2D visualization library to build a route planner that finds a path between two points on a real-world map Github link Route Planning Project
